safecaR: Access NHTSA Vehicle Safety Data from R

Overview

The safecaR R package provides a tidy interface to NHTSA APIs, including crash ratings, recalls, and complaints.

⚠️ Note: This package requires an internet connection to fetch data from public NHTSA APIs. If you’re offline, functions will not return results.

Installation

You can install the latest release of safecaR on Github with the following:

# install.packages("remotes") if you don't have it
remotes::install_github("c-a-s-t-l-e/safecaR")

Basic Use

  1. Access vehicle crash ratings for a single vehicle
# uses the NHTSA vehicle ID for 2022 Acura RDX
ratings <- get_ratings(7520)
head(ratings)
  1. Access vehicle crash ratings for all model variants
ratings_all <- get_ratings_by_model(2022, "ACURA", "RDX")
head(ratings_all)
  1. Access vehicle recalls
recalls <- get_recalls(2022, "ACURA", "RDX")
head(recalls)
  1. Access vehicle complaints
complaints <- get_complaints(2022, "ACURA", "RDX")
head(complaints)
